sentence.Network_en: Bears are very inquisitive and must be kept mentally stimulated.
sentence.Network_cn: 熊非常好奇，必须不断地给予其智力上的刺激。

sentence.Network_en: You may be physically and mentally exhausted after a long flight.
sentence.Network_cn: 长途飞行后，你可能会感到身心疲惫。

sentence.Network_en: Mentally, he can still run rings round men half his age!
sentence.Network_cn: 他在智力上仍远远高于那些比他年轻一半的人。

entry.def: Mental means relating to the process of thinking.
Mental means relating to the state or the health of a person's mind.

example.ex: The mental state that had created her psychosis was no longer present.
example.tran: 导致她精神失常的那种心理状态已经消失了。

entry.tran: 内心的;在头脑中进行的
entry.def: A mental act is one that involves only thinking and not physical action.

example.ex: Practise mental arithmetic when you go out shopping...
example.tran: 外出购物的时候练习一下心算。

example.ex: Graham made a quick mental calculation.
example.tran: 格雷厄姆很快就心算出来了。

entry.def: If you say that someone is mental, you mean that you think they are mad.

example.ex: I just said to him 'you must be mental'.
example.tran: 我刚才对他说：“你一定是疯了。”

entry.tran: 记在脑子里;把…牢记在心
entry.def: If you make a mental note of something, you make an effort to store it in your memory so that you will not forget it.

example.ex: She made a mental note to have his prescription refilled.
example.tran: 她记着要拿他的处方再配一回药。

example.ex: She made a mental note not to sit anywhere near him.
example.tran: 她心里牢牢记着不坐在他的附近。

auth_sentence.content: I think it was mentally not being tough enough.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think it was mentally not being tough enough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think it was mentally not being tough enough.

auth_sentence.content: Obama needs to shake up a mentally obese society.
auth_sentence.res_content: Obama needs to shake up a mentally obese society.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Obama needs to shake up a mentally obese society.

auth_sentence.content: Mentally, my head was all over the place.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mentally, my head was all over the place.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mentally, my head was all over the place.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地

great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地

logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地

necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

means.word_mean: 心理上;精神上,智力上,思想上

sentences.en: an institution for mentally ill offenders
sentences.cn: 为患有精神病的违法者设立的精神病院

sentences.en: By tacit agreement,Clark’s friends all avoided any mention of his mentally ill wife.
sentences.cn: 克拉克的朋友们心照不宣,绝口不提他那位患精神病的妻子。

sentences.en: He was so slow that many thought him mentally retarded.
sentences.cn: 他迟钝得很,许多人以为他智力低下。
